bosses.location: From the Grand Cloister Site of Grace, head west until the path ends and carefully drop down the broken ledges to the floor below. Cross the small river of Scarlet Rot and follow it west and then south until you see a coffin. Ride the coffin to a room in front of Astel's fog gate.

bosses.name: Ulcerated Tree Spirit

bosses.name: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
bosses.location: From the Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace, head counterclockwise along the plateau's western and southern edges past Hermit's Shack and to the Craftsman's Shack Site of Grace. Head northeast from there past Hermit Village and you'll find Maggie.

bosses.name: Night's Cavalry
bosses.location: Patrols the road between Waypoint Altus Highway Junction and Grand Lift of Dectus

bosses.name: Beastman of Farum Azula
bosses.location: Dragonbarrow Cave

bosses.name: Putrid Crystalians
bosses.location: At the end of Sellia Hideaway.

bosses.name: Dragonkin Soldier
bosses.location: Head south from the Worshippers' Woods Site of Grace to a collapsed pillar with an Ancestral Follower archer perched on it. Follower the pillar up to its base, where you'll see the Siofra River East waygate.  This waygate will transport you to the plateau in the center of Siofra River. When you arrive, head northwest to the open plain of shallow water, where you'll find the Dragonkin Soldier collapsed in a heap. As you approach, it will rise up and the fight will begin. You can also reach this boss from the Ancestral Woods Site of Grace by carefully dropping down from above.

bosses.name: Margit, The Fell Omen (Leyndell)
bosses.location: Take the path north from Stormhill Shack and turn left at the fork, curving back south up a hill full of Godrick Soldiers. You'll need to either fight your way through these soldiers or run past them to reach the Castleward Tunnel Site of Grace, which is just in front of the boss door.
bosses.info: Upon running here, a shackled npc will be shrouded in a holy light, and will transform into Margit, a non-boss version, but with more health and damage than the boss version. He drops the Viridian Amber Medallion +1.

bosses.name: Death Rite Bird
bosses.location: On the cliffside, north of Shack of the Lofty

bosses.name: Black Blade Kindred
bosses.location: Base of the Grand Lift of Rold

bosses.name: Frenzied Duelist
bosses.location: At the end of Gaol Cave. You need to use the lever to open the cells, in one of the last there is a large room with two corpses. In the right of this room hide a passage behind a wooden planck wall. The boss is below it.

bosses.name: Crystalian Spear & Crystalian Ringblade
bosses.location: Inside the Altus Tunnel

bosses.name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
bosses.location: Head north from the Inner Consecrated Snowfield Site of Grace to the river of ice, then follow it east and you'll run into Theodorix. Consider opening the Cave of the Forlorn with a Stonesword Key to get a closer Site of Grace, but beware of the Giant Land Octopus guarding its entrance.

bosses.name: Cleanrot Knight (Spear) & Cleanrot Knight (Sickle)
bosses.location: Final Boss(es) of the Abandoned Cave. It can be accessed by going east from Smoldering Wall site of grace and walking across canyon by using tree branches.

bosses.name: Valiant Gargoyle Duo
bosses.location: From the Aqueduct-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace off the Hallowhorn Grounds, head east through a tunnel and along the ridge, then jump down onto the buttress just below the edge. Walk along the buttress until you hit a wall, then jump down again onto the platform below. Continue northeast up two sets of stairs, then go through the first door on your right and continue north along the waterlogged passageway. Head northeast out to the balcony and up the stairs to the northwest. This will lead you into a large room with a waterfall, which the first Valiant Gargoyle will jump down, beginning the fight.
bosses.info: (Twinblade) will join the fight after the first one’s health reaches half

bosses.name: Fia’s Champions
bosses.location: Fia's Champions can be found in Deeproot Depths, through a tunnel next to the Across the Roots Site of Grace. This grace can be found by travelling upwards along buildings and roots found north of the entrance to the depths. The boss only activates upon getting close to the waygate at the opposite side of the large room.

bosses.name: Erdtree Avatar
bosses.location: Head southwest along the water from the Great Waterfall Crest Site of Grace, and you'll see the Avatar patrolling the area.

bosses.name: Dragonlord Placidusax
bosses.location: From "Beside the Great Bridge" Grace site, go down the elevator, walk down stairs and outside, continue straight towards the trees, and look over the edge for a platform.Jump down on the platforms below until you reach a platform with graves. Look for a "Lie Down" prompt, if you lie down it'll teleport you into Dragonlord Placidusax's arena.

bosses.location: Outside the Bestial Sanctum

bosses.name: Commander O'Neil
bosses.location: On the Heart of Aeonia site of grace, the site appears after defeating him.

bosses.name: Glintstone Dragon Adula
bosses.location: Found dwelling in front of Ranni's Rise. Will teleport away to Cathedral of Manus Celes in southwest Liurnia when down to below 50% health.

bosses.name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
bosses.location: Flies in as you descend the hill. Drops Lansseax's Glaive.Will fly to the east after taking enough damage.

bosses.name: Dragonkin Soldier of Nokstella
bosses.location: From the Ainsel River Downstream Site of Grace, drop down off the ledge into the river and follow it downstream into the western cave. You'll enter a cave full of Giant Ants. Head north and you'll eventually reach the Dragonkin Soldier's boss door. Once you enter the boss room, it will drop down from the ceiling and the fight will begin.

bosses.name: Regal Ancestor Spirit
bosses.location: Ancestor Spirit is found in an isolated arena accessible from Nokron, Eternal City. To access it, you must light all six obelisks by the stairs to the Hallowhorn Grounds northeast of the Ancestral Woods Site of Grace. When you've done so, the deer carcass at the back of the temple will glow and you can interact with it to teleport just outside the boss's arena. Walk through the fog gate to fight the boss. See the wiki for more info.
bosses.info: Like the Ancestor Spirit - unlock by lighting the braziers around the area. Rewards a Remembrance.

bosses.name: Erdtree Avatar
bosses.location: From the entrance to Tombsward Catacombs, head east and then south up the hill. The Avatar is standing directly in front of the Minor Erdtree.

bosses.name: Lichdragon Fortissax
bosses.location: From the Prince of Death's Throne Site of Grace (which can only be accessed by defeating Fia's Champions), give Fia the Cursemark of Death, talk to her three times, and reload the area. Then interact with her corpse and choose to Enter the Deathbed Dream.
bosses.info: If you talk through all of fia's dialog you will be teleported into the boss fight to get all the dialog you may need to rest at a grace a couple times.

bosses.name: Mohg, the Omen
bosses.location: Found in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds (?). Accessible from Forsaken Depths.

bosses.name: Golden Hippopotamus

bosses.info: As with most invader NPCs, he won't be able to invade you if you cleared all the area bosses in Limgrave (Tree Sentinel, Flying Dragon Agheel, Tibia Mariner in Summonwater Village, Mad Pumpkin Head in Waypoint Ruins, and Margit, the Fell Omen)

bosses.name: Preceptor Miriam
bosses.location: In large room after approaching the first staircase, will teleport further and further along the path through the tower as damage is taken

bosses.name: Dung Eater

bosses.name: Baleful Shadow
bosses.location: By Nokstella Waterfall Basin Site of Grace in Ainsel River Main: Through the cave to the south.
bosses.info: Appears as part of Ranni's Quest. Speak with the doll you pick near the Ainsel River Main site of grace (by resting at the Ainsel River Main site) and it will tell to kill this enemy.

bosses.name: Inquisitor Ghiza
bosses.location: Upstairs in Volcano Manor

bosses.name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
bosses.location:
• Right in front of the Smoldering Church in Caelid.
  • As you approach the Corpse-Stench Shack, at the end of the road leading to Mt. Gelmir.
  • In the Consecrated Snowfield, along the frozen river southwest of Ordina, Liturgical Town, on the straight-line path between Ordina and Yelough Anix Ruins. The best landmark is a corpse sitting in a chair on the river's south bank holding a Stonesword Key.

bosses.name: Mad Tongue Alberich
bosses.location: Roundtable Hold
bosses.info: Invades after jumping off the balcony

bosses.name: Crucible Knight
bosses.location: Near Tanith; triggered by attacking her.

bosses.name: Great Horned Tragoth
bosses.location: Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook. Triggered by invading his world through the sigil. Assassination target related to Patches' Quest in Volcano Manor.

bosses.name: Old Knight Istvan
bosses.location: Underneath the Divine Bridge, 1st assassination target for the Volcano Manor quests.

bosses.name: Dung Eater
bosses.location:
In the moat, near Leyndell, Royal Capital.

bosses.loot:
• Crusade Insignia

  • Ash of War: Flame Skewer (see Notes)

bosses.name: Ancient Dragon-Man
bosses.location: On or near the rocks

bosses.name: Moonrithyll, Carian Knight
bosses.location: In a room partway through Castle Ensis

bosses.name: Logur, the Beast Claw
bosses.location: Stalks the woods in this area

bosses.name: Swordhand of Night Anna
bosses.location: Finger Ruins of Miyr - On the way down the ruins.

bosses.name: Leda's Questline (1st battle)
bosses.location: In the center of the bridge. After progressing through Needle Knight Leda's questline, two summon signs will appear.
bosses.loot:
Helping Leda:

  • Falx
  • Hornsent's Armor

Helping Hornsent:

  • Ash of War: Swift Slash
  • Leda's Rune
bosses.info:
Helping Leda:

  • Ends Hornsent's Questline
  • Progresses Needle Knight Leda's Questline

Helping Hornsent:

  • Ends Needle Knight Leda's Questline, except the last step.

Helping neither (skipping the fight):

  • Progresses Leda's Questline (1st battle).

    ONLY IF

    Hornsent is summoned against Messmer the Impaler

bosses.name: Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
bosses.location: In the back room of Storehouse, First Floor
bosses.loot:
Helping Leda:

  • Ansbach's Longbow
  • Ansbach's Set

Helping Ansbach:

  • Ansbach's Longbow
  • Leda's Rune
bosses.info:
After progressing through Needle Knight Leda's questline, two summon signs will appear:

Helping Leda:

  • Progresses Needle Knight Leda's questline
  • Ends Sir Ansbach's Questline

Helping Ansbach:

  • Ends Needle Knight Leda's questline, except the last step.

Helping neither (skipping the fight):

As Helping Ansbach, without the items.

bosses.name: Salza, Fire Knight Sage
bosses.location: Waiting at the end of the bridge.

bosses.name: Thiollier
bosses.location: After taking St. Trina's poison 4 times she will respond after you die, when you respawn Thiollier will start talking. Once Thiollier is finished talking tell them what St. Trina told you, they will deny that you are the chosen giving you the option to tell them again. Once you told them again talk to them again and they will threaten you. Dying to St. Trina again will give more dialogue with her, once you respawn Thiollier will invade you.

bosses.name: Hornsent
bosses.location: Near the stairs to Church of the Bud. Only appears after progressing his questline.

bosses.name: Needle Knight Leda
bosses.location:
In the Cleansing Chamber. Depending on your choices during questlines, additional characters may be present:

Additional Enemies:

  • Dryleaf Dane: Always. Drops Dane's Footwork
  • Hornsent: If Hornsent's Questline has been progressed until the last step. Drops Hornsent's Armor and Falx.

Potential Allies:

  • Sir Ansbach: If Sir Ansbach's Questline has been progressed until the last step, and you sided with him during Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
  • Sanguine Noble Nataan: If Sir Ansbach's Questline has been progressed until the last step, and you skipped Leda's Questline (2nd battle).

bosses.name: Moore
bosses.location: Will invade if the Forager Brood is killed instead of healed.

bosses.name: Godrick the Grafted

bosses.name: Radagon of the Golden Order
bosses.location: Within the Erdtree. He is part one of a two part final boss fight.
bosses.loot: • None. Defeating him transitions straight into the fight with the Elden Beast.

bosses.name: Elden Beast
bosses.location: Within the Erdtree. It is part two of the final boss fight. It will automatically begin on defeating Radagon of the Golden Order
